card.name: Ryoto, Wilds Walker
card.text: Flash When Ryoto enters, target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains reconstruct until end of turn. Its reconstruct cost is equal to {2} plus its mana cost. (You may cast that card from your graveyard for its reconstruct cost reduced by the mana value of a permanent you sacrifice as you cast it this way. Then exile it.)

card.name: Yearning Mimic
card.text: Lifelink At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target creature you control get +2/+2 and lose all abilities until end of turn.

card.name: Remnant of Rocket
card.text: Menace When Remnant of Rocket enters, create a 3/2 white Beast creature token. Whenever Remnant of Rocket and at least two other creatures attack, Remnant of Rocket deals 3 damage to the defending player.

card.name: Ravenous Flytrap
card.text: Whenever a creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. Then if this is the third time this ability has triggered this turn, you may return a creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield with a finality counter on it. (If a creature with a finality counter on it would die, exile it instead.)

card.name: Valiant Truthseeker
card.text: Paradox — Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, draw a card. Then discard a card unless that spell was cast from anywhere other than your hand.

card.name: Maven of Disaster
card.text: Flash When Maven of Disaster enters, if you cast it, exile target creature or spell. Return that card to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Nasty Plot
card.text: Flash Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+0. When enchanted creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control.

card.name: Cliffside Crusher
card.text: Trample When Cliffside Crusher enters, if you have three or more land cards in your graveyard, put two +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Dregs of Industry
card.text: Flying When Dregs of Industry enters, choose one — • Exile up to three cards from graveyards. • Remove all counters from target permanent.

card.name: Excavation Mole
card.text: Trample When Excavation Mole enters, mill three cards.

card.name: The Earth Endures
card.text: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If this spell was cast from your graveyard, you may put it onto the battlefield instead. Shuffle. Reconstruct {4}{G} (You may cast this from your graveyard for its reconstruct cost reduced by the mana value of a permanent you sacrifice as you cast it this way. Then exile this.)

card.name: Doomed Trainer
card.text: When Doomed Trainer dies, create a 3/2 white Beast creature token.

card.name: Treetop Trapper
card.text: Reach When Treetop Trapper enters, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, create a 1/2 green Spider creature token with reach.

card.name: Prepare for Trouble!
card.text: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn. Up to one target creature you control gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Scalewrought Protector
card.text: Commune ({2}, Exile this from your hand as a sorcery: Create a 1/1 red Human creature token. You may cast this from exile on a later turn, and each creature you tap while casting it this way pays for {1}.) Haste

card.name: Bellowing Behemoth
card.text: Trample When Bellowing Behemoth enters, you may sacrifice a land or discard a land card. If you do, exile the top two cards of your library. You may play those cards until the end of your next turn.

card.name: Gluttonous Ghost
card.text: Menace {2}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Gluttonous Ghost. Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Sanaito's Nightmare
card.text: Target opponent exiles two cards from their hand. If fewer than two cards were exiled this way, you may draw a card and lose 1 life. Reconstruct {5}{B} (You may cast this from your graveyard for its reconstruct cost reduced by the mana value of a permanent you sacrifice as you cast it this way. Then exile this.)

card.name: Partner in Crime
card.text: When Partner in Crime enters, create a 1/1 red Human creature token. You lose 1 life. Partner in Crime can't block.

card.name: Mournful Amnesiac
card.text: Despair (When this creature attacks, if it isn't decayed, you may have it succumb to despair. If you do, it gains decayed at the beginning of the next end step.) Deathtouch When Mournful Amnesiac succumbs to despair, it gets +2/+0 and gains menace until end of turn.

card.name: Beauty of the Wastes
card.text: When Beauty of the Wastes enters, choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind it already has.

card.name: To the Sea, Returned
card.text: Surveil 1, then draw a card. Reconstruct {2}{U} (You may cast this from your graveyard for its reconstruct cost reduced by the mana value of a permanent you sacrifice as you cast it this way. Then exile this.)

card.name: Icy Glare
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}. Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature.

card.name: Emissary of the Sun
card.text: Commune ({2}, Exile this from your hand as a sorcery: Create a 1/1 red Human creature token. You may cast this from exile on a later turn, and each creature you tap while casting it this way pays for {1}.) Flying, vigilance

card.name: Pacifying Predator
card.text: Whenever Pacifying Predator attacks, tap target creature defending player controls.

card.name: Warden's Mission
card.text: Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control. You gain 3 life.

card.name: Lonely Youngling
card.text: Despair (When this creature attacks, if it isn't decayed, you may have it succumb to despair. If you do, it gains decayed at the beginning of the next end step.) When Lonely Youngling succumbs to despair, it gets +1/+1 and gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Wandering Vagabonds
card.text: When Wandering Vagabonds enters, search your library for a Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. During your turn, Wandering Vagabonds has first strike.

card.name: Preserved Specimens
card.text: When Preserved Specimens enters or dies, you draw a card and lose 1 life.

card.name: Future's Present
card.text: Vigilance Paradox — Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. It can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Shrieking Pest
card.text: Paradox — Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, Shrieking Pest deals 2 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Sunset Chaser
card.text: When Sunset Chaser enters, choose one — • Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. • You may sacrifice another permanent. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Unrelenting Titan
card.text: Golems you control have haste. Unrelenting Titan can't attack or block unless you control three or more Golems. Whenever Unrelenting Titan enters or attacks, discard up to two cards, then draw that many cards. {3}, {T}: Create a 1/1 white Golem creature token.

card.name: Chikyu's Champion
card.text: When Chikyu's Champion enters, search your library for a battle card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Chikyu's Champion deals 151 damage to it.

card.name: Conduit of Change
card.text: Commune ({2}, Exile this from your hand as a sorcery: Create a 1/1 red Human creature token. You may cast this from exile on a later turn, and each creature you tap while casting it this way pays for {1}.) When Conduit of Change enters, it deals damage equal to the number of tapped creatures you control to any target. You gain that much life.

card.name: Rage of the Reef
card.text: When Rage of the Reef enters, search your library for a card, put it into your graveyard, then shuffle. When Rage of the Reef dies, if it isn't a token, create a token that's a copy of it.

card.name: Dark-Dwelling Mycellium
card.text: When Dark-Dwelling Mycellium enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Whenever a creature you control dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on another target creature you control.

card.name: Berry Basket
card.text: This Equipment enters with two +1/+1 counters on it. Remove a counter from this Equipment: Put a +1/+1 counter on equipped creature. Activate once each turn and only as a sorcery. Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on this Equipment. Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Brick by Brick
card.text: When Brick by Brick enters, discard a card, then draw a card. At the beginning of your end step, if there are three or more land cards in your graveyard, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card until you exile another card with Brick by Brick.

card.name: Community's Garden
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if a permanent left the battlefield under your control this turn, you draw a card and gain 3 life.

card.name: The City Made Wild
card.text: (As an Encounter enters, choose an opponent to protect it. Whenever defense counters are removed from it, put that many +1/+1 counters on it, then you may transform it.) When The City Made Wild enters, up to two target creatures can't block this turn. --- (Back): The Stone Made Steel

card.name: The Stone Made Steel
card.text: Whenever The Stone Made Steel attacks, target creature with lesser power can't block this turn. --- (Front): The City Made Wild

card.name: Bump in the Road
card.text: (As an Encounter enters, choose an opponent to protect it. Whenever defense counters are removed from it, put that many +1/+1 counters on it, then you may transform it.) When Bump in the Road enters, tap all creatures target player controls and put a stun on each of them. --- (Back): Awoken Pathmaker

card.name: Awoken Pathmaker
card.text: Vigilance --- (Front): Bump in the Road

card.name: First Contact
card.text: (As an Encounter enters, choose an opponent to protect it. Whenever defense counters are removed from it, put that many +1/+1 counters on it, then you may transform it.) When First Contact enters, it deals 2 damage to any target. Draw a card. --- (Back): Beginning of the End

card.name: Beginning of the End
card.text: Haste When this creature transforms into Beginning of the End, each player exiles their hand. They may play cards exiled this way for as long as they remain exiled. Players can't cast spells from their hand. If a player would draw a card, they exile the top card of their library instead. They may play that card until the beginning of their next end step. --- (Front): First Contact
